article:
The DC animated universe was a series of shows and feature length films that
aired or were released during the period from 1992 through 2006 and featured
many characters from the DC Comics roster. While many characters played
important or ongoing roles in the series, many more appeared only in the
background. This is a list of characters appearing in the related shows and
films. The information is broken down by production and sorted by original air
date or release date.
categories: DC Comics characters in other media
